title: Group portrait of groom, standing wearing moustache, necktie with shield pattern, and light colored carnation on left lapel, posed with smiling bride wearing light colored hat, earrings, necklace, light colored long sleeved sweater, light colored wool skirt, and carnation on left shoulder, posed around light colored armchair, in interior with window with light colored lace and dark geometrically patterned curtains and furniture, possibly on Monticello Street in Homewood Brushton
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
